name: Coins of the Forge Candle Set with Embedded Metal Coins
blurb: A candle set meant to enhance your tabletop gaming with evocative scents and beautifully designed metal coins!

name: Every penny counts, the soapy adventure.
blurb: Hand crafted specialty soaps made by a loving family.

name: Ditch your plastic toothbrush campaign ! V2.0
blurb: An Idea to small necessities like the plastic toothbrushes & swapping with a bamboo at a discounted price!

name: Quirky Crafts Box
blurb: A Cute and Quirky Seasonally Themed Craft Box for Kids!

name: Heirloom Chimes
blurb: Handmade stained glass chimes with a unique flair made to last a lifetime

name: Goal Digger Planner - Believe in the beauty of your Goals
blurb: Write your goals, dreams, and daily tasks in a fashionable yet convenient way. Be reminded year round of the beauty of your goals.

name: Christmas with Krampus
blurb: Traditionally illustrated Christmas cards, gift wrap and ornaments featuring Krampus the Christmas demon.

name: Make 100 Workaholic Hamster Cards
blurb: Snarky greeting cards featuring an anxious hamster. With two fun, hand-painted illustrations the front cover is only half the story...

name: "SUGAR HIGH" Birthday Card
blurb: A card with a cute cotton candy koala carried atop a cantankerous alpaca celebrating crazy occasions!

blurb: Beautiful handmade pens made from exotic & domestic hardwood burls & spalted woods. Choose your favorite wood for a personal touch.

name: The Art Journal Kit
blurb: A workshop-in-a-box designed to give you everything you need to learn to art journal!

name: Music Wall Art -- Personalized
blurb:
Personalized wall art for music students, performers, and teachers. 
A wonderful gift for birthdays, holidays, recitals or graduation.

name: 2019 Snowman Greeting Card Collection
blurb: A limited-run of the 2019 collection of 10 whimsical snowman themed greeting cards featuring all-new illustrations by Mark Molchan
